question:
Change these sentences into simple past tense, baseed on the given Marka in bracket! (number 1 to 3)    1. my family (go) to the cinema last week ( -, ? )

2. the student (study) in the laboratory yesterday ( +, - )

3. she (go) to Bandung two days ago (+, -)

4. the girl was very happy to hear the good news
 ( - ) .......

5. Active voice : the clever student brings a dictionary in his bag
 passive voice :.........​

answers.answer:
1. (-) my family did not go to the cinema last week.

(?) Did my family go to the cinema last week ?

2. (+) the student studied in the laboratory yesterday.

(-) the student did not study in the laboratory yesterday.

3. (+) she went to Bandung two days ago.

(-) she did not go to Bandung two days ago.

4. (-)

5. Passive voice: a dictionary is brought by student in his bag.

cmiiw

Jawaban:

2. The farmer gave her a pail of milk.

related_questions.question:
My uncle's house is situated on a hill. It has very beautiful hilly green rice field scenery.    There is a (1) ... farm at the backyard. My uncle really loves and keeps the chicken well.
The house is not (2)..., but it is lovely and clean. I love staying there. This is the place
where my uncle's family spends most of their time together. It has three bedrooms, a living
room, a dining room, a (3) ..., and two bathrooms.
At the front, there is a living room. Next to this room, there is a dining room. My uncle's
bedroom is near the dining room. The bedroom is (4)... and warm. There is a kitchen and
two bathrooms at the back of the house.
Each room has some furniture. My uncle (5) ... the furniture properly. They are not
expensive, but he always keeps them free from dust. He does this because he wants to
make his house seen as the nicest place to live in.
a. arranges
b.
chicken
C. neat
d. big
kitchen
e.​

A fish live on the....
Tolong bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

water

sea

ocean

dead sea

lakes

Penjelasan:

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

a fish lives on the…
artinya: “ikan hidup di…”

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

karena banyak banget kita pilih yang paling umum aja ya, laut

laut bahasa inggrisnya sea

jadi jawabanya…

“a fish lives on the sea”

Jawaban:

Feeds

Penjelasan:

Kalimat tersebut adalah kalimat PRESENT TENSE

Jika ada subject he, she, it. Maka kata kerja nya harus diikuti imbuhan -s ataupun -es. Tetapi jika ada subject i, you, they, we. Maka kata kerja nya tidak diberi imbuhan -s ataupun -es.

Keterangan :

Semoga membantu.

Have a nice day :)

answers.answer:
